title: Do People Understand the Scale of the Universe?
description:
People don’t understand the scale of the Universe. There’s a data driven way to read the news: go to https://ground.news/veritasium to get 30% off the Vantage plan and see through sensationalized reporting. 

If you’re looking for a molecular modeling kit, try Snatoms – a kit I invented where the atoms snap together magnetically – https://ve42.co/SnatomsV   


▀▀▀
A huge thank you to Dr. Ashmeet Singh for his expert feedback on this video.
